sentence: …BROADCASTING; Aghguiguian, Avedis:       WETA; Agnew, Robert: SRN NEWS (SALEM); Agnew, Singeli: AL       JAZEERA ENGLISH; Agobian, Faiez: AP-BROADCAST; Agredo, Jose:       TELEMUNDO NETWORK; Agudelo, David: WUSA-TV; Ahmadzai, Khan:       NEWSMAX TV; Ahmed, Faiza: AL JAZEERA ENGLISH; Ahrimou, Sr.,       Mohamed: ALARABY TV; Aiello, Nicholas: NBC NEWS;…

…passion for electronics led to a successful career in broadcasting,  where he worked with WTVJ in Miami, co-founded Omni Video, and later  served as Engineering Manager at Telemundo. He also shared his  expertise as a Technical Advisor for the Broward County School Board,  mentoring the next generation of media professionals.
